channel.title: [tut]How to install fonts (with pictures!)
channel.description:
Have you been wondering how to use cooler fonts? Probably not! But just incase you dont know how, I made this ;)
To start off, you would probably want to download the fonts. To do so you can look in Mr. Chris's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,9997.0.html][b]*Complete* PS Rescources[/b][/url]. He has pretty much all of the good font sites listed.
Once you have downloaded the Font that will make your sigs pwn, go to the file in which you saved them to. Right click the one you like and hit copy [img]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/6497/copyfontww4.png[/img] (or you can hold ctrl and click multiple files at a time)
Next, Go to My Computer [img]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/4102/mycomputerhg9.png[/img] then Local Disk (C) [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/4561/localdiskcla1.png[/img]
Now you have to go into Windows [img]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/1159/windowsfolderzk1.png[/img] And finally scroll all the way down into Windows Font folder [img]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/1060/windowsfontsfolderwt3.png[/img]
Now you have to right click somewhere, and simply click "Paste" [img]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/2712/pastefontcq5.png[/img]
Tada! Now you have cutsom fonts installed to your computer! You may now access them in Photoshop by going to the drop down menu when you are using the type tool. You can even use your fonts in Microsoft Word, Paint, and most other programs that let you chose your fonts. Have fun

item.title: [tut]How to install fonts (with pictures!)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Have you been wondering how to use cooler fonts? Probably not!
But just incase you dont know how, I made this

To start off, you would probably want to download the fonts. To do so you can look in Mr. Chris’s Complete PS Rescources. He has pretty much all of the good font sites listed.

Once you have downloaded the Font that will make your sigs pwn, go to the file in which you saved them to. Right click the one you like and hit copy

(or you can hold ctrl and click multiple files at a time)

Next, Go to My Computer
then Local Disk ©

Now you have to go into Windows

And finally scroll all the way down into Windows Font folder

Now you have to right click somewhere, and simply click “Paste”

Tada! Now you have cutsom fonts installed to your computer! You may now access them in Photoshop by going to the drop down menu when you are using the type tool. You can even use your fonts in Microsoft Word, Paint, and most other programs that let you chose your fonts.
Have fun
